description:
Wix# is a framework for building a complete MSI or WiX source code by using build script files written with the C# syntax.
The package contains Wix# binaries, code sample and custom MSBuild target (to be merged with VS project and trigger building MSI during the project compilation).

If you need only Wix# binaries you may want to use WixSharp.bin package instead.

In order to use this package you need have WiX Toolset installed.
The package is tested against WIX (Windows Installer Xml) Toolset v3.10 (v3.10.2103.0)
releaseNotes:
Release v1.0.35.0
* Implemented UtilsFileSearch dedicated class
* Implemented Project.AddWixFragment
* Updated VS project templates to reflect ManagedUI autoscaling improvements
* Updated Compiler to hint how to solve "WiX binaries not found" problem
* Removed all old obsolete API
* Updated NuGet WixSharp.bin package - added BootstrapperCore.dll
* All VS projects now reference BootstrapperCore.dll and WindowsInstalled.dll from src but not from GAC
* Issue#110: Please update cscs.exe (v3.12.2.0)
* MsiInterop.cs has been reimplemented to solve the licensing clash (MIT vs LGPL). Triggered by [discussion:653568]
* Issue#109: Support putting FirewallException in Component. Added FirewallException.IsProcessSpecific member
* Issue#107 ManagedUI scaling issue
** Added ManagedUIShell.OnCurrentDialogChanged event and ManagedUIShell.OnCurrentDialog property
** Implemented automatic disabling of feature tree custom-draw checkbox
* Issue#106: Tasks.LatestFrameworkDirectory returns an invalid directory. The routine is fixed and property name is changed to more adequate 'CurrentFrameworkDirectory'
* Issue#105: Source file 'GenericEntity.cs' could not be found
* Removed '*' -> "All Unassigned" conversion from WebAddress
* Added SetupEventArgs.ManagedUIHandle and WIXSHARP_MANAGED_UI_HANDLE session property
* Added generic interface for processing user defined WixEntities (e.g. to support WiX extensions)
* Issue#103: It should be possible to install multiple IISVirtualDirs under a single WebSite
* Issue#102: WebSite API: WebSite.Name should be completely hidden in favour of WebSite.Description
* Issue#101: Wix# Creates Id attribute instead of Ip attribute in WebAddress element (from pull request #8740)
title: Wix# (WixSharp) - managed interface for WiX
